name: Ring Rage
description:
Ring Rage is a standard wrestling game, just without the glitz and glamour of licensed games. There are six wrestlers total, but only five are playable:
  • Gunboat Rody, a former Navy sailor
  • Spike, a giant of a man from the means streets of New York
  • Yasha, a masked Japanese wrestler
  • Shadam, a Middle Eastern grappler
  • KO Joe, a former boxer now trying his hand at professional wrestling.
Killer Cane, an unknown wrestler from Canada is faced in the championship bout of the tournament, but he is not a playable character.

There are only three modes, 1P v. CPU, 1P v. 2P (which is achieved through a cable link and an extra cartridge) and a tournament which you compete to go for the TWF (Taito Wrestling Federation) championship.

shot.caption: An overview of the different fighters
There are different venues to fight.
A strong punch to the stomach.
Pin down the opponent when his energy is low.
Don't touch the fence in this cage. When an opponent is down, it's the perfect moment to do some extra damage.
This guy is incredibly fast and acrobatic... but now he is mainly on the ground.
